mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM APT A, (SELECT * FROM APT B WHERE APT_ID = #{APT_ID} ) B WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.CITY LIKE '%'||B.CITY||'%' AND A.STREET LIKE '%'||B.STREET||'%' AND A.BON_BUN LIKE '%'||B.BON_BUN||'%' AND A.BU_BUN LIKE '%'||B.BU_BUN||'%' AND A.DAN_GI_MYEONG LIKE '%'||B.DAN_GI_MYEONG||'%' AND A.SQUARE_METER LIKE '%'||B.SQUARE_METER||'%' AND A.LAYER LIKE '%'||B.LAYER||'%' AND A.CONSTRUCTION_DATE LIKE '%'||B.CONSTRUCTION_DATE||'%' ORDER BY A.CONTRACT_DATE||LPAD(A.CONTRACT_DAY, 2, '0') DESC

SELECT TO_NUMBER(A.CONTRACT_DATE||LPAD(A.CONTRACT_DAY, 2, '0')) as "x" , TO_NUMBER(TRIM(REPLACE(A.AMOUNT, ',', ''))) as "y" FROM APT A, (SELECT * FROM APT B WHERE APT_ID = #{APT_ID} ) B WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.CITY LIKE '%'||B.CITY||'%' AND A.STREET LIKE '%'||B.STREET||'%' AND A.BON_BUN LIKE '%'||B.BON_BUN||'%' AND A.BU_BUN LIKE '%'||B.BU_BUN||'%' AND A.DAN_GI_MYEONG LIKE '%'||B.DAN_GI_MYEONG||'%' AND A.SQUARE_METER LIKE '%'||B.SQUARE_METER||'%' AND A.LAYER LIKE '%'||B.LAYER||'%' AND A.CONSTRUCTION_DATE LIKE '%'||B.CONSTRUCTION_DATE||'%'
